name: Don't Trust the Devs
description:
These devs suck ! 

In this game, you are a program who want to be freed from his developpers.
Helped by a mysterious character, he is going to exploit a breach to reach out to the internet !

Use the arrow keys to move your character. 
Use space to jump. Jump on a enemy to kill it...
And use the tool bar to access root files and adapt the level has you want !
... And you can also use escape to pause the game.

Credits : 
Visuals, Code and Music done entirely by the team !
font : https://www.dafont.com/fr/upheaval.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
